channel.title: Asides on Deuts Log
channel.description: Recent content in Asides on Deuts Log

item.title: Movary
item.description:
Movary

Self hosted web app to track and rate your watched movies
I wish one of these could prove a better alternative to Trakt.
item.content:encoded:
Movary

Self hosted web app to track and rate your watched movies
I wish one of these could prove a better alternative to Trakt.

item.title: MediaTracker
item.description:
MediaTracker

Self hosted media tracker for movies, tv shows, video games, books and audiobooks.
Another Trakt alternative. Why expand to video games, books, and audiobooks, though?
item.content:encoded:
MediaTracker

Self hosted media tracker for movies, tv shows, video games, books and audiobooks.
Another Trakt alternative. Why expand to video games, books, and audiobooks, though?

item.title: Watcharr
item.description:
Watcharr

Open source, self-hostable watched list for all your content (movies, tv series, anime, games) with user authentication, modern and clean UI and a very simple setup.
Now that Trakt.tv started implementing stricter limits to free users, time to look for alternatives.
item.content:encoded:
Watcharr

Open source, self-hostable watched list for all your content (movies, tv series, anime, games) with user authentication, modern and clean UI and a very simple setup.
Now that Trakt.tv started implementing stricter limits to free users, time to look for alternatives.

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JKPQ710DF3HEJY7NRSJCHQSW
item.description: Finished set up of dedicated Python container to house my various Python scripts. Now I don’t have to rely to Code Server container being up in order to execute them on schedule.
item.content:encoded: Finished set up of dedicated Python container to house my various Python scripts. Now I don’t have to rely to Code Server container being up in order to execute them on schedule.

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JKB7NFRYS1E7AM98S78ME8M4
item.description: #Memos now has Shortcuts where you can have custom filters set up. Close to one of my wishlists for Memos, but I would have preferred a permalink for these shortcuts so I can bookmark them and easily get back to them later: www.usememos.com/âˆ #UseMemos

item.title: Mastodon/Bluesky to Memos
item.description:
Mastodon/Bluesky to Memos

A Python script that listens to your Bluesky/Mastodon posts and captures them in your Memos instance.
I’m not sure if this is something I want implemented as is, but the script could be a reference and a starting point for my future scripts.
item.content:encoded:
Mastodon/Bluesky to Memos

A Python script that listens to your Bluesky/Mastodon posts and captures them in your Memos instance.
I’m not sure if this is something I want implemented as is, but the script could be a reference and a starting point for my future scripts.
